Translations.Text: (Popol pet vi Hor end mond). Dir knowledge thereof est nur DI! all vi kon Hor est close
DI KONDAMN disbelievers prepar them INFER
Eternally ili abide therein. Ili ne trov lord nor supporter
Tag ili jxet Infer ili dir Oh ni wish ni obe DI obe messenger
Ili ankaux dir Our Lord ni obe our mastr estr ili plumb us astray
Our Lord don them double retribution curse them tremendous curse
O vi kred ne est those dolor Moses tiam DI absolved him de ki ili dir. Li est sight DI honorable
O vi kred reverence DI utter nur gxust utterances
Li tiam fiks your works forgive your pek. Those obe DI His messenger triumf great triumf
Ni ofert responsibility (freedom de choice heavens ter mont ili rifuz bor gxi est afraid de gxi! human est akcept gxi li transgressing ignorant)
Por DI testament inevitably pun hypocrite hom hypocrite women idol worshipping hom idol worshipping women DI redeems kred HOM kred women DI est Forgiver Merciful
